name: dcm2niix_afni
author: AFNI Team
description: DICOM to NIfTI converter optimized for AFNI

inputs.name: Input Folder
inputs.description: Folder containing DICOM files

inputs.name: GZ Compression Level
inputs.description: GZ compression level (1=fastest..9=smallest, default 6)
Adjacent DICOMs (images from same series always in same folder) for faster conversion (n/y, default n)
inputs.name: Adjacent DICOMs

inputs.description: BIDS sidecar (y/n/o [o=only: no NIfTI], default y)
inputs.name: BIDS Sidecar

inputs.description: Anonymize BIDS (y/n, default y)
inputs.name: Anonymize BIDS

inputs.description: Comment stored in NIfTI aux_file (provide up to 24 characters e.g. '-c first_visit')
inputs.name: Comment

inputs.description: Directory search depth. Convert DICOMs in sub-folders of in_folder? (0..9, default 5)
inputs.name: Directory Search Depth

inputs.description: Export as NRRD (y) or MGH (o) instead of NIfTI (y/n/o, default n)
inputs.name: Export Format

inputs.description: Filename template for output (default '%f_%p_%t_%s')
inputs.name: Filename Template

inputs.description: Generate defaults file (y/n/o/i [o=only: reset and write defaults; i=ignore: reset defaults], default n)
inputs.name: Generate Defaults

inputs.description: Ignore derived, localizer and 2D images (y/n, default n)
inputs.name: Ignore Images

inputs.description: Losslessly scale 16-bit integers to use dynamic range (y/n/o, default o)
inputs.name: Lossless Scale

inputs.description: Merge 2D slices from same series regardless of echo, exposure, etc. (n/y or 0/1/2, default 2)
inputs.name: Merge Slices

inputs.description: Only convert this series CRC number - can be used up to 16 times (default convert all)
inputs.name: Series CRC Number

inputs.description: Output directory (omit to save to input folder)
inputs.name: Output Directory

inputs.description: Philips precise float (not display) scaling (y/n, default y)
inputs.name: Phillips Scaling

inputs.description: Rename instead of convert DICOMs (y/n, default n)
inputs.name: Rename DICOMs

inputs.description: Single file mode, do not convert other images in folder (y/n, default n)
inputs.name: Single File Mode

inputs.description: Up-to-date check
inputs.name: Up-to-Date Check

inputs.description: Verbose (n/y or 0/1/2, default 0)
inputs.name: Verbose

inputs.description: Write behavior for name conflicts (0=skip duplicates, 1=overwrite, 2=add suffix)
inputs.name: Write Behavior

inputs.description: Crop 3D acquisitions (y/n/i, default n, use 'i'gnore to neither crop nor rotate 3D acquisitions)
inputs.name: Crop 3D

inputs.description: GZ compress images (y/o/i/n/3, default n) [y=pigz, o=optimal pigz, i=internal:miniz, n=no, 3=no,3D]
inputs.name: GZ Compress

inputs.description: Byte order (y/n/o, default o) [y=big-endian, n=little-endian, o=optimal/native]
inputs.name: Big Endian

inputs.description: Slicer format progress information (y/n, default n)
inputs.name: Progress

inputs.description: Disregard values in 0018, 1060 and 0020, 9153
inputs.name: Ignore Trigger Times

inputs.description: Omit filename post-fixes (can cause overwrites)
inputs.name: Terse

inputs.description: Report version
inputs.name: Version

inputs.description: Slicer format features
inputs.name: XML
